# RizzosAI Sales Site Project

This project creates a Flask web application for the RizzosAI sales site to be deployed on Render at domain.rizzosai.com.

## Project Requirements
- Flask web application
- Professional packages page with pricing tiers ($29, $99, $249, $499)
- Detailed guide descriptions for each tier
- Red, white, blue Australian theme
- Render deployment configuration
- Responsive design

## Deployment Target
- Platform: Render
- Domain: domain.rizzosai.com
- Technology: Python Flask

## Package Tiers
- STARTER ($29): 5 Essential Success Guides
- PRO ($99): 13 Advanced Business Guides  
- ELITE ($249): 20 Elite Strategy Guides
- EMPIRE ($499): 35 Empire Building Guides
